I should begin by saying that I visited in 2008, way before they earned their michilin star, however the experience has lasted as this was my favorite restaurant in Spain, maybe of all time!The fois w/ cherries, the cheese courses, wine pairing all reasonable and professional, the finest moment in cuisine I have had to date!my attempt at translation:Debo comenzar diciendo que he visitado en 2008, mucho antes de que obtuvo su estrella Michilin, sin embargo la experiencia ha durado ya que éste era mi restaurante favorito en España, tal vez de todos los tiempos! El foie w / cerezas, el queso cursos, maridaje todas las medidas razonables y profesional, el mejor momento en la cocina que he tenido hasta la fecha!
